channel.title: Blessed ~ To Be A Blessing
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Welcome to Blessed[/size][/center] [center][size=18pt]This is a PK Economy server[/center]
[center][size=36pt]Debaiting wether i should have a beta? what should i do?[/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Features[/size][/center] [center][size=18pt]I will be updating this[/center] [center][size=18pt]I have a long way to go![/center] [center]Perfected Combat & Animations with a twist[/center] [center]PVM for good items[/center]
[center][size=24pt]Updates[/size][/center] [center]Currently adding new PvP World system instead of shity wilderness[/center] [center]Fixed Cast on player bug (was able to cast mage on player outside of wilderness)[/center] [center]Removed Wilderness.. lol[/center] [center]|demonHorns Work| Changed/upgraded animations for OP weapons (chaotics, Ags, claws, and so on)[/center]
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/23/java2012121612201907.png/][IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/5900/java2012121612201907.png[/img][/URL]
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/24/java2012121521343697.png/][IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/3411/java2012121521343697.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/827/java2012121521352515.png/][IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/130/java2012121521352515.png[/img][/URL] [/center] [center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/812/java2012121521372984.png/][IMG]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/2001/java2012121521372984.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/600/java2012121521383780.png/][IMG]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/1216/java2012121521383780.png[/img][/URL] [/center]
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/689/java2012121521384259.png/][IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/2245/java2012121521384259.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/706/java2012121521385289.png/][IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/7895/java2012121521385289.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Blessed Team[/size][/center] [center]Only Me, unfortionatly..[/center] [center]Chance that DemonHorn will be helping.[/center]
[left][size=18pt]Credits[/size][/left] [left]Demonhorn |Gave me rights to use source|[/left] [left]Me, Changed it up a bit and fixed a few major bugs.[/left]

item.title: Blessed ~ To Be A Blessing
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:7, topic:473629”][quote author=shank beast link=topic=591561.msg4182201#msg4182201 date=1355678436]

Where’s the “twist” you speak of? This looks like everything else.

Here’s a preview of what i’m working on.
as well as prayer system hehe…


[/quote]

Which tells us… nothing…? I advise you to create a Developmental Log so programmers can see what you’ve done.

Example:

[quote]
Development Key:

SS = Server-sided

CS = Client-sided

Stone Archive:

  • Too many edits and small things to list. The entire Base has been touched in some fashion.

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text Method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

  • Player to Player Following has been removed. (SS)

  • All Scroll-Bars have been removed. (CS)

  • Magic Tab cleaned out for the Tzhaar Magic Tab. (CS)

  • Potion and other UseItem Packet content has been removed. (SS)

  • Player Death has been removed. (SS)
    [/quote][/quote]

Mkay…? added it.

Read full topic

item.title: Blessed ~ To Be A Blessing
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“shank beast, post:6, topic:473629”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=591561.msg4182192#msg4182192 date=1355677529]
Where’s the “twist” you speak of? This looks like everything else.
[/quote]

Here’s a preview of what i’m working on.
as well as prayer system hehe…

[/quote]

Which tells us… nothing…? I advise you to create a Developmental Log so programmers can see what you’ve done.

Example:

Development Key:

SS = Server-sided

CS = Client-sided

Stone Archive:

  • Too many edits and small things to list. The entire Base has been touched in some fashion.

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text Method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

  • Player to Player Following has been removed. (SS)

  • All Scroll-Bars have been removed. (CS)

  • Magic Tab cleaned out for the Tzhaar Magic Tab. (CS)

  • Potion and other UseItem Packet content has been removed. (SS)

  • Player Death has been removed. (SS)

Read full topic
